licensing.name: Licensing & Terms
licensing.description: Questions about dataset licensing, usage rights, and terms

faqs.question: What license types are available for HARBOR datasets?
faqs.answer: HARBOR offers three license types: Training License (use data to train AI models with no usage limits), Commercial License (use in commercial products with redistribution rights), and Exclusive License (exclusive access where competitors cannot license the same data). Each license type has different pricing and terms tailored to your use case.

faqs.question: Can I redistribute HARBOR datasets to third parties?
faqs.answer: Redistribution rights depend on your license type. Training Licenses do not include redistribution rights - the data can only be used internally for model training. Commercial and Exclusive Licenses may include redistribution rights based on your specific agreement. Contact our sales team for custom redistribution terms.

faqs.question: How long is my dataset license valid?
faqs.answer: Standard Training Licenses are perpetual for the version you licensed - you can continue using that version indefinitely. However, access to updates and new versions requires an active subscription. Commercial and Exclusive Licenses have custom terms negotiated per agreement.

datasets.name: Datasets & Content
datasets.description: Questions about dataset content, quality, and specifications

faqs.question: How are HARBOR datasets annotated?
faqs.answer: HARBOR uses a multi-stage annotation pipeline combining automated ML models (YOLOv11, SAM2, Whisper, CLIP) with human quality review. All annotations go through continuous refinement based on model feedback and usage patterns. We maintain version history for all annotation changes.

faqs.question: What data formats are available for download?
faqs.answer: Datasets are available in multiple formats including JSONL for structured metadata, COCO format for object detection, Parquet for large-scale processing, and raw media files (MP4, WAV, FLAC). Our API supports streaming in real-time or batch download.

faqs.question: Are all datasets rights-cleared for AI training?
faqs.answer: Yes, all HARBOR datasets are fully rights-cleared for AI training. We maintain complete provenance records and consent documentation for all content. This includes contributor agreements, release forms, and chain-of-custody tracking from capture to distribution.

faqs.question: How often are datasets updated?
faqs.answer: Active datasets receive monthly updates with new content and annotation improvements. Major version updates (with schema changes) happen quarterly. All updates are versioned, and you can pin to specific versions for reproducibility.

api.name: API & Integration
api.description: Questions about API access, SDKs, and technical integration

faqs.question: How do I get API access to HARBOR?
faqs.answer: API access is included with all paid plans. After signing up, you'll receive an API key in your dashboard. We provide SDKs for Python, JavaScript, and REST endpoints. Start with our quickstart guide at docs.harbor.ai/quickstart.

faqs.question: What are the API rate limits?
faqs.answer: Rate limits depend on your plan: Starter (100 requests/minute), Pro (1,000 requests/minute), Enterprise (custom limits). Streaming endpoints have separate limits optimized for continuous training workloads. All limits are soft limits - contact us for increases.

faqs.question: Can I stream data directly to my training pipeline?
faqs.answer: Yes, HARBOR supports real-time streaming via our Dataset Streaming API. You can pipe data directly into PyTorch DataLoaders, TensorFlow Datasets, or any custom pipeline. This eliminates the need to download and store large datasets locally.

pricing.name: Pricing & Billing
pricing.description: Questions about pricing, plans, and payment

faqs.question: What does HARBOR cost?
faqs.answer: HARBOR offers three plans: Starter ($500/month - 10GB access, 1K API calls), Pro ($2,500/month - 100GB access, 25K API calls, commercial license), and Enterprise (custom pricing - unlimited access, dedicated support, custom pipelines). All plans include full annotation data.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial of the Pro plan for qualified teams. The trial includes full API access and up to 10GB of data. Contact our sales team to get started with your trial.

faqs.question: How does usage-based billing work?
faqs.answer: Beyond your plan's included quota, usage is billed per GB accessed ($0.05/GB for Starter, $0.03/GB for Pro) and per 1,000 API calls ($0.50/1K). Enterprise plans have custom volume pricing. Usage is tracked in real-time in your dashboard.

contributors.name: Data Contributors
contributors.description: Questions about contributing data and earning revenue

faqs.question: How do I contribute data to HARBOR?
faqs.answer: Download our Kled app (iOS/Android) to start contributing photos and videos. All uploads are reviewed for quality and rights compliance. Once approved, your content enters the marketplace and you earn revenue based on usage.

faqs.question: What is the revenue share for contributors?
faqs.answer: Contributors receive 70% of all revenue generated from their data. HARBOR retains 30% to cover infrastructure, annotation, and marketplace operations. Payments are made monthly once you reach the $100 minimum threshold.

faqs.question: What types of content are accepted?
faqs.answer: We accept photos and videos of everyday scenes, activities, and environments. Content must be original (you own the rights), not contain identifiable individuals without consent, and meet our quality guidelines. We prioritize diverse, real-world content.
